compatibility.notes: TGPPL-1.0 allows for weak copyleft, meaning that while modifications to the original work must be shared under the same license, linking with other software under compatible licenses is permitted without imposing the same license on the entire work.

key_requirements: Include the license text with any distributed copies.
Do not use Licensor's trademarks without permission.
license.name: TGPPL-1.0
obligations: Distribute or communicate copies of Original Work or Derivative Works under the same license within 12 months.
Provide a machine-readable copy of the Source Code when distributing the Original Work.
